类 ConstantFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.common.platform.sys.factory.ConstantFactory
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    IConstantFactory

    @Component
 @DependsOn(value="springContextHolder")
public class ConstantFactory
extends java.lang.Object
implements IConstantFactory
